items.content_html: A lightweight tool to analyze HTML pages, detect and track script load timings, and monitor performance. This package injects a loading indicator and logs all <script> tags' load events for detailed insights.
items.title: indrajithc/html-script-analyzer: A lightweight tool to analyze HTML pages, detect and track script load timings, and monitor performance. This package injects a loading indicator and logs all <script> tags' load events for detailed insights.

items.content_html: Lillihub is a simple, lightweight micro.blog web client with a light/dark mode and responsive design. It is built using Deno, HTML, CSS, and a sprinkle of vanilla JavaScript. It is delightfully usable without JavaScript being enabled.
items.title: heyloura/lillihub-client: Lillihub is a simple, lightweight micro.blog web client with a light/dark mode and responsive design. It is built using Deno, HTML, CSS, and a sprinkle of vanilla JavaScript. It is delightfully usable without JavaScript being enabled.

items.content_html: The use-local-storage library is a lightweight utility that simplifies working with localStorage in React applications. It provides a custom hook (useLocalStorage) to store, retrieve, and update local storage values while keeping the UI in sync.
